data.title: A DIRECTOR'S FILM; Chief Credit for 'How Green Was My Valley' Must Certainly Go to John Ford

A DIRECTOR'S FILM; Chief Credit for 'How Green Was My Valley' Must Certainly Go to John Ford

Nov. 2, 1941

See the article in its original context from

November 2, 1941 , Section X , Page 5Buy Reprints

TimesMachine is an exclusive benefit for home delivery and digital subscribers.

Full text is unavailable for this digitized archive article. Subscribers may view the full text of this article in its original form through TimesMachine.

SEVERAL months ago this critic was put on the pan by couple of Hollywood writers -- script writers, that is to say -- who charged that our judgments of pictures too often neglected to estimate their craft. Al ways the director got the credit but never the writer -- that's what they said. View Full Article in Timesmachine Â»
